description:
Planning to visit Russia?

Afraid that you won't understand a word?

Want to learn some basics which will help you to feel confident?

This course is for YOU!

"Travel Russian" guide is created for travelers who are planning to visit Russia and wants to be prepared for the trip. In this course we will discuss all general situations that can happen when you're abroad (from arrival to conversations at drugstore) and learn Russian words and phrases which can be used in these situations.

"Travel Russian" is about 40 minutes long and is divided into 10 sections, some sections consist of several lections. The course type is interactive presentation with speaker's voice.

Please note, that the Target Audience of the guide is TRAVELERS. This course will not be helpful for people who are going to learn Russian language.

Course also contains a PDF file, summarizing all topics and quiz!

If you think some topic is missing / have a question / simply need an advice - please feel free to contact me!
title: Travel Russian Guide
